name: Warriors Heaven
description: Warriors Heaven is a turn based RPG with an arcade style game flow. Pick 3 classes, buy items and customize their gear. Then try to win as many battles as possible to get a high score. Supported with a Campaign mode featuring a story and tutorial. A dynamic and deep combat system allows for an endless amount of player expression and challenges. A front row/back row system creates ranges for attacks. Certain skills deal Guard Break damage, allowing you to stun an enemy and lower their defenses. A new approach to status effects makes combat more strategic. Status resistances can be lowered mid battle in various ways to make an enemy vulnerable. A large roster of classes ranging from RPG staples, such as the Knight, White Mage or Archer. As well as specialized unique ones like the Daredevil, Executioner and the Sand Man.
